players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: " I'm shocked by Alice's death and want to know who could have done it."
Charlie: " I think we should focus on finding the mafioso and not accuse each other. We need to work together."
Diana: "I believe Bob is the mafioso and we should investigate them further."
